item.description:
interested in forming Bollywood fusion dance teams? Anyone with experience as part of a team or teaching or who are just interested and can commit to working together as a team for good causes (and hv fun)- lets get together to discuss!

We'll meet at the MGH Main building at 3- and walk over to the meeting room together! We have coffee and cocoa :)

Cheers and hope to see everyone there!!

-Sara
item.name: Those interested in forming Bollywood fusion dance team
